cause.description:
for my senior graduation project im planning a chairty fashion show to benifit The united way with the help of local stores sponsering the event
The fashion show itself will be held on Sunday November 11th at 2:00PM in the Radnor High School Auditorium
1. raise the most amount of money
2. to make it a fun and exciting event!
cause.mission: raise the most money to benifit the United Way
cause.name: United Way Charity Fashion Show (RADNOR HIGH SCHOOL)
